alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 10:05PM EDT until April 02 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kentucky...Illinois...Missouri... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. Ohio River at Shawneetown. Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. Ohio River at Cairo. Ohio River at Mount Vernon. Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. .Recent heavy rainfall is resulting in rises on the Ohio River. The river is forecast to rise above flood stage at several locations during the first half of the week. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon to Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 37.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly bottomland and surrounding low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 33.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 40.2 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
